00015         class ITexture;
00016 
00018         enum E_TEXTURE_CLAMP
00019         {
00020                 ETC_DIFFERENT = -1,
00022                 ETC_REPEAT = 0,
00024                 ETC_CLAMP,
00026                 ETC_CLAMP_TO_EDGE,
00028                 ETC_CLAMP_TO_BORDER,
00030                 ETC_MIRROR
00031         };
00032         static const char* const aTextureClampNames[] = {
00033                         "texture_clamp_repeat",
00034                         "texture_clamp_clamp",
00035                         "texture_clamp_clamp_to_edge",
00036                         "texture_clamp_clamp_to_border",
00037                         "texture_clamp_mirror", 0};
00038 
00040         class SMaterialLayer
00041         {
00042         public:
00044                 SMaterialLayer()
00045                         : Texture(0),
00046                                 TextureWrap(ETC_REPEAT),
00047                                 BilinearFilter(true),
00048                                 TrilinearFilter(false),
00049                                 AnisotropicFilter(false), TextureMatrix(0)
00050                         {}
00051 
00053 
00054                 SMaterialLayer(const SMaterialLayer& other)
00055                 {
00056                         // This pointer is checked during assignment
00057                         TextureMatrix = 0;
00058                         *this = other;
00059                 }
00060 
00062                 ~SMaterialLayer()
00063                 {
00064                         MatrixAllocator.destruct(TextureMatrix);
00065                         MatrixAllocator.deallocate(TextureMatrix); 
00066                 }
00067 
00069 
00071                 SMaterialLayer& operator=(const SMaterialLayer& other)
00072                 {
00073                         // Check for self-assignment!
00074                         if (this == &other)
00075                                 return *this;
00076 
00077                         Texture = other.Texture;
00078                         if (TextureMatrix)
00079                         {
00080                                 if (other.TextureMatrix)
00081                                         *TextureMatrix = *other.TextureMatrix;
00082                                 else
00083                                 {
00084                                         MatrixAllocator.destruct(TextureMatrix);
00085                                         MatrixAllocator.deallocate(TextureMatrix); 
00086                                         TextureMatrix = 0;
00087                                 }
00088                         }
00089                         else
00090                         {
00091                                 if (other.TextureMatrix)
00092                                 {
00093                                         TextureMatrix = MatrixAllocator.allocate(1);
00094                                         MatrixAllocator.construct(TextureMatrix,*other.TextureMatrix);
00095                                 }
00096                                 else
00097                                         TextureMatrix = 0;
00098                         }
00099                         TextureWrap = other.TextureWrap;
00100                         BilinearFilter = other.BilinearFilter;
00101                         TrilinearFilter = other.TrilinearFilter;
00102                         AnisotropicFilter = other.AnisotropicFilter;
00103 
00104                         return *this;
00105                 }
00106 
00108                 ITexture* Texture;
00109 
00111                 E_TEXTURE_CLAMP TextureWrap;
00112 
00114                 bool BilinearFilter;
00115 
00117 
00119                 bool TrilinearFilter;
00120 
00122 
00126                 bool AnisotropicFilter;
00127 
00129 
00130                 core::matrix4& getTextureMatrix()
00131                 {
00132                         if (!TextureMatrix)
00133                         {
00134                                 TextureMatrix = MatrixAllocator.allocate(1);
00135                                 MatrixAllocator.construct(TextureMatrix,core::IdentityMatrix);
00136                         }
00137                         return *TextureMatrix;
00138                 }
00139 
00141 
00142                 const core::matrix4& getTextureMatrix() const
00143                 {
00144                         if (TextureMatrix)
00145                                 return *TextureMatrix;
00146                         else
00147                                 return core::IdentityMatrix;
00148                 }
00149 
00151 
00152                 void setTextureMatrix(const core::matrix4& mat)
00153                 {
00154                         if (!TextureMatrix)
00155                         {
00156                                 TextureMatrix = MatrixAllocator.allocate(1);
00157                                 MatrixAllocator.construct(TextureMatrix,mat);
00158                         }
00159                         else
00160                                 *TextureMatrix = mat;
00161                 }
00162 
00164 
00166                 inline bool operator!=(const SMaterialLayer& b) const
00167                 {
00168                         bool different =
00169                                 Texture != b.Texture ||
00170                                 TextureWrap != b.TextureWrap ||
00171                                 BilinearFilter != b.BilinearFilter ||
00172                                 TrilinearFilter != b.TrilinearFilter ||
00173                                 AnisotropicFilter != b.AnisotropicFilter;
00174                         if (different)
00175                                 return true;
00176                         else
00177                                 different |= (TextureMatrix != b.TextureMatrix) &&
00178                                         TextureMatrix && b.TextureMatrix &&
00179                                         (*TextureMatrix != *(b.TextureMatrix));
00180                         return different;
00181                 }
00182 
00184 
00186                 inline bool operator==(const SMaterialLayer& b) const
00187                 { return !(b!=*this); }
00188 
00189         private:
00190                 friend class SMaterial;
00191                 irr::core::irrAllocator<irr::core::matrix4> MatrixAllocator;
00192 
00194 
00196                 core::matrix4* TextureMatrix;
00197         };
